item.title: Best Practices for Investigating Phishing Incidents in Microsoft Defender for Office 365
item.description: When a suspicious email is delivered due to policy configurations or evolving threat techniques, timely investigation is critical to minimizing impact. Microsoft Defender for Office 365 (MDO) offers a comprehensive suite of tools within the Incidents tab that empowers security teams to swiftly identify, investigate, and respond to email threats. But how do you investigate efficiently? What’s the most effective workflow once an alert fires?
